manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Augus Augus Bag is a trusted leather bag supplier,our main categories include briefcase, messenger bag, backpack, travel bag, wallet, waist pack, chest pack This is the perfect slim leather messenger bag for the modern traveler. This 'Augus Business' luxurious leather flap over crossbody business messenger bag is the perfect slim leather messenger bag for the modern traveler. Travel comfortably with a braid padded, adjustable shoulder strap. Loaded with features including a main compartment with laptop pocket, magnetic closures under the leather flap, and a rear access pocket for your most essential business items

Details about the leather briefcase Best lightweight genuine leather bags for you Quality is always the first thing that we care about, all our products are made of high-quality materials and tested by the strict quality control system.

Large Capacity Leather Laptop Bag It has a roomy pocket for your daily supplies. Not very large, but perfect for work, business, daily use, trip, travel, and so on. Let's pack our bags, start our lightweight journey to find the balance between the life of struggling and leisure, to experience the magical things we never meet, and to seek the unknown world beyond our life with hope and yearning.

Color Assortment Appr.8.6*3.1*10 inchs,weight 2.2 Pounds we have built a strict quality control system. All leather is well checked before crafting. Each bag will be tested after production, before warehousing, and delivery. This messenger bag not only suitable for men but also for women.

Front Features Slim messenger bag construction with dual magnetic closures under the leather flap, easy to open, convenient for daily use. Side Features Permanent, braid padded, and adjustable shoulder strap, which is comfortable and can relieve the stress for your shoulder. Rear Features Men’s leather laptop messenger bag rear exterior open pocket for easy access to frequently needed items. Bottom Features The leather crossbody messenger bag is equipped with a front zipper pocket, main pocket, compartment pocket, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality construction
reviews.reviewText: The leather is reasonable quality and the stitching is close and uniform. The zippers are not YKK, but they work smoothly and do not bind. I would prefer two magnetic snaps to close the bag, but the single snap is quite strong. Several nice touches -- The lining is good, extra leather on the bottom, gusseted pocket in front and a leather strap. (Some competitors use cloth). A very good bag for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical Man bag
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my husband, we've tried several. He wanted a cross body or swing bag for travel to carry all his items safely and to avoid the chance of getting pick pocketed. First this is leather, all leather including the strap. The strap is adjustable and long enough for a big & tall man. It has plenty of organization and the flap has a magnetic closure that seems sturdy but only time will tell how well it will hold up. The bag has plenty of organization on the interior, a back zipper pocket for ID or passport. The only drawback is the black interior that matches the black leather, it makes it a bit hard to see items in the bag but other than than the bag is great for a man to carry for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product but flap doesn't snap well
reviews.reviewText: Nice leather. The pockets were a good size for me. Carried our passports and some small items in the zippered pouch and my huge battery and some cables and snacks in the large pocket.Looks good and I liked it.The one draw back is that the snap that is supposed to secure the flap was not easy to fasten and most of the time it just wasn't fastened at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance at best
reviews.reviewText: I love the way it feels and the way it looks. Everyone I know they give me good compliments for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Me ha impresionado el cuidado de los detalles
reviews.reviewText: Se siente fuerte, tiene excelente presencia, con los detalles bien cuidados. Entra perfectamente un iPad 8 (10.2 pulgadas) - eso si con pocas cosas, para que cierre bien. La correa externamente es de cuero y en el anverso de tela antideslizante, me parece que ello reduce la fricción para evitar que se malogre la ropa con el contacto. Mi única observación es con el largo de la correa, mido 1.83 y siento que es un poco corta, no me parece una buena opción para personas altas. Sería recomendable que el vendedor coloque fotos donde indique la altura del modelo, de forma que los compradores podamos estimar si corresponde con nuestra estatura.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handsome and convenient!
reviews.reviewText: Got it for our 15 year old Grandson for Christmas. He is active in Theatre. Classy bag to carry needed items in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received crossbody bag today. Could easily be used as a woman's bag! It is the perfect size and very sturdy. May order it in another color for his Christmas present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just wasn't what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Bought it, got it, tried it out, didn't feel right for me, returned it.
